story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: Which side do you think will win?
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’m thinking Lear’s supporters! After all, they’ve got
Leon on their side!
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But we can’t underestimate Rose’s supporters
either.
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’m sure Mr. Rose has a secret strategy planned!
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
To the public, today’s match was announced as
just another tournament, but...
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: It sure doesn’t seem that way.
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah. People are seeing this as settling the score
between two factions—Lear’s supporters
and Rose’s.
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Normally, there’d be no chance to win in a
Pokémon battle against Leon.
story_galar_02_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Makes me wonder why Chairman Rose is looking
so confident.
